job_history.work_description: Collected customer feedback and made process changes to exceed customer satisfaction goals. Addressed customer service inquiries in a timely and accurate fashion. Provided accurate and appropriate information in response to customer inquiries.

Delivered excellent customer service by greeting and assisting each customer. Addressed customer inquiries and resolved complaints. Designed and implemented customer satisfaction metrics. Completed weekly schedules according to payroll policies.

Managed a $30,000 monthly sales portfolio. Served as liaison between customers, store personnel and various store departments. Answered customers' questions and addressed problems and complaints in person and via phone.
Verified and logged in deadlines for responding to daily inquiries. Assisted with payroll preparation and entered data into cumulative payroll document.
Collected customer feedback and made process changes to exceed customer satisfaction goals. Provided accurate and appropriate information in response to customer inquiries.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in customer-facing roles, consistently delivering excellent customer service, and making process changes to exceed customer satisfaction goals, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has consistently demonstrated strong communication skills, providing accurate and appropriate information to customers, and addressing customer inquiries in a timely and accurate fashion, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience as a Sales Manager, managing a sales portfolio and serving as a liaison between customers and store personnel, suggesting strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has demonstrated ability to manage time effectively, completing weekly schedules according to payroll policies, and verifying deadlines for responding to daily inquiries, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Has assisted with payroll preparation and entered data into cumulative payroll documents, showing a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Has experience as a Data Entry operator, verifying and logging deadlines, and entering data into cumulative payroll documents, showing a solid working proficiency in data entry.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has consistently demonstrated ability to address customer complaints and resolve problems, suggesting strong proficiency in problem-solving.
